mapper.select: SELECT GR.NO , TO_CHAR(GR.BORROW, 'HH24:MI') BORROW , TO_CHAR(GR.RSV_END, 'HH24:MI') RSV_END , PG.NAME NAME FROM GOODS_RESERVATION GR JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON GR.E_NO = E.NO JOIN PUBLIC_GOODS PG ON GR.GOODS_NO = PG.NO WHERE GR.E_NO = #{eNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GOODS_RESERVATION WHERE E_NO = #{eNo} AND NO = #{no}
